org.nettosphere.samples.games

Class SnakeWebSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nettosphere.samples.games.SnakeGame
      • org.nettosphere.samples.games.SnakeWebSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.atmosphere.websocket.WebSocketHandler

    public class SnakeWebSocket
extends SnakeGame
implements org.atmosphere.websocket.WebSocketHandler
    Simple WebSocketHandlerService that implement the logic to build a Snake Application. The Game's code itself is taken from Apache Tomcat.
    Author:
    Jeanfrancois Arcand
